bib.title: Usability of contemporary tools for the computational design of architectural objects: Review, features evaluation and reflection
bib.author: Nisztuk, Maciej and Myszkowski, Pawe{\l} B
bib.abstract: This article is an overview focused on functionality and usability of selected contemporary approaches for the computational floor plan generation of architectural objects. This article describes current solutions for generative architectural design and focuses on their usability from the point of view of architectural design practice. Recent research papers and prototypes, as well as the most important tools (selected computer-aided design and BIM software) for generative design from the architectural perspective, are described. The
bib.publisher: SAGE Publications Sage UK: London, England
